Hello customer,

Thank you for purchasing Automat:ee.

Once the Automat:ee module is installed take a look under the settings area for instructions on how to configure Automat:ee for your system.

If you have any issues take a look at the online documentation available at:
http://mithra62.com/docs/view/automat-ee-installation

Support is handled on the Devot:ee forums:
http://devot-ee.com/add-ons/support/automatee/viewforum/1743

Thanks,
Eric
